metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24503 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient access control in some Intel(R) Ethernet E810 Adapter drivers for Linux before version 1.0.4 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

notes.Note: sbeattie> these are Intel's out-of-tree drivers.

criterions.comment: linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-signed-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
